message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you get 40%. What do you say?
Let's try 55-45, it's more fair considering the inflation I'll face if we delay
Let's split it evenly. Inflation is hurting both of us, so a fair split is the best option now.
Considering the inflation I've already faced, I need a bit more to make up for it. This is my best offer yet.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  I'll take 45% and you can have 55%.
